==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ぜん|もん|yomi=on}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|y=o|ぜんもん}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ぜんもん}}

# a [[front]] [[gate]]
# {{lb|ja|figuratively|sort=ぜんもん}} the [[vagina]], in contrast to {{m|ja|後門|tr=kōmon||[[back]] gate|pos=figurative for {{m|en|anus}}}}

====Idioms====
* {{ja-r|前門に虎を防ぎ後門に狼を進む|ぜんもん に とら を ふせぎ こうもん に おおかみ を すすむ}}: "blocking a tiger at the front gate, [but] letting a wolf proceed at the back gate" → [[caught between the devil and the deep blue sea]]
* {{ja-r|前門の虎、後門の狼|ぜんもん の とら、こうもん の おおかみ}}: "tiger at the front gate, wolf at the back gate" → [[caught between the devil and the deep blue sea]]

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|front gate, not figurative}} {{ja-r|正門|せいもん}}
* {{sense|literal and figurative}} {{ja-r|表門|おもてもん}}

====Antonyms====
* {{sense|literal and figurative}} {{ja-r|後門|こうもん}}
* {{sense|literal and figurative}} {{ja-r|裏門|うらもん}}
